sense.gloss: giving and taking, exchange (of letters), arguing back and forth, (conversational) exchange

sdata.j: ↑先↑↓さき↓ほどの↑彼↑↓かれ↓らの|やり↑取↑↓と↓り|にはひやひやしたよ。まさに↑一触即発↑↓いっしょくそくはつ↓の↑危機↑↓きき↓だったね。
sdata.e: I was really nervous to see how they dealt with each other just now. I guess things were touch-and-go between them.

sdata.j: ↑目↑↓め↓の↑前↑↓まえ↓で↑繰↑↓く↓り↑広↑↓ひろ↓げられる|やり↑取↑↓と↓り|は、↑俺↑↓おれ↓が↑入↑↓はい↓り↑込↑↓こ↓む↑隙↑↓すき↓なんて↑一↑↓いち↓ミリもない。
sdata.e: The exchange unfolding in front of my eyes had not a single millimetre of a gap in which for me to slip.

sdata.j: トムとメアリーは↑毎日↑↓まいにち↓200↑通↑↓つう↓↑以上↑↓いじょう↓の↑携帯↑↓けいたい↓メールを|やり↑取↑↓と↓り|している。
sdata.e: Tom and Mary exchange more than 200 text messages every day.
